attributes.review: Me and my husband shrek decided to download this app to hear news about our favorite Cheeto president and let me say it was a huge mistake. I do NOT consider news to be naked pictures of our favorite orange cheese puff, the only naked pictures I would like to see are of my husband as it is not a sin in the eyes of our lord and savior Gabbie Hanna. Not to mention the app has hacked into my phone changed my home and lock screen to be more nakey pictures of mr cheeto president, my camera roll is also filled with these horrendous photos AND videos. And on top of this my family (including my favorite daughter kaitlyn bennett) have been possessed. These things have lead me to sadly say I will be voting for Charli Dâ€™Amelio in this years upcoming presidential election. PLEASE fix these minor bugs and I will reconsider my vote!!

attributes.review: I was told to download this app due to my uncle suggesting it. Iâ€™m fairly new to politics so I didnâ€™t know what to expect. So, I downloaded the app. Next, my dog and I settled down for some quality content. As soon as I opened the app, a large photo of the president showed up and my dog quite literally vomited all over my sheets after she watched me open the app. I am assuming it startled her to the point of retching. Due to myself having emetophobia, it caused me to get sick also. I just assumed it was best for me to delete the app. I am now more politically educated and I know this app is not for me. Never downloading it again out of concern for my health mentally and physically. I am now waiting for Bernie to make an app because he is my savior. Sorry I donâ€™t recommended this app to anyone else.

attributes.review:
is!

  
I'm helping him sue the human race.

  
- Hello.
- Hello, bee.

  
This is Ken.

  
Yeah, I remember you. Timberland, size
ten and a half. Vibram sole, I believe.

  
Why does he talk again?

  
Listen, you better go
'cause we're really busy working.

  
But it's our yogurt night!

  
Bye-bye.

  
Why is yogurt night so difficult?!

  
You poor thing.
You two have been at this for hours!

  
Yes, and Adam here
has been a huge help.

  
- Frosting...
- How many sugars?

  
Just one. I try not
to use the competition.

  
So why are you helping me?

  
Bees have good qualities.

  
And it takes my mind off the shop.

  
Instead of flowers, people
are giving balloon bouquets now.

  
Those are great, if you're three.

  
And artificial flowers.

  
- Oh, those just get me psychotic!
- Yeah, me too.

  
Bent stingers, pointless pollination.

  
Bees must hate those fake things!

  
Nothing worse
than a daffodil that's had work done.

  
Maybe this could make up
for it a little bit.

  
- This lawsuit's a pretty big deal.
- I guess.

  
You sure you want to go through with it?

  
Am I sure? When I'm done with
the humans, they won't be able

  
to say, "Honey, I'm home,"
without paying a royalty!
attributes.title: This app is trash

attributes.review: I was at first excited to download this app and get all the latest news of my favorite orange.. I- mean president. So as any other supporter would do I downloaded this app. As soon as it had finished downloading Apple gave me alert of a virus had been detected!! I really didnâ€™t think much of it because my president wouldnâ€™t so this to his supporters right? And hunny..that was where I was wrong. Excessive app crashing occurred as well as unexplained phone bill increases and overheating THATS WHERE U GOT ME MESSED UP! This app took control of my whole device!! I had to get a new iPhone which costed money out of my pocket!! Not to mention I am unemployed, this caused me to no longer be financially stable. I do not recommend this app it could ruin your life in the matter of seconds.
